updates.text: [CCL] UPDATE: Normal train services between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar have resumed.
[CCL] UPDATE: Train services have ended between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #PayaLebar. Free regular bus and bridging bus have ceased.

[CCL] UPDATE: Train services have ended between #DhobyGhaut / #MarinaBay and #Mountbatten. Please continue to add additional 30 minutes between #Mountbatten and #PayaLebar. Free regular bus services and bridging bus services are still available.
